name: World Filler
description:
World Filler is a game developed in a game jam named "Jamination'19" which is a part of a event named "Oyun Geliştirme Günleri" (Game Development Days) hosted by Istanbul Technical University Game Design and Development Club.

#oyungelistirmegunleri #jamination19

Game Jam's Theme: Every end is a new beginning.

How to Play:

  • Move the character by moving the mouse cursor
  • For faster movement hold Mouse Button 2 (right click) but remember you'll lose weight.
  • Collecting opposite color reduces your weight.
  • In order to complete your world, you must fill the fill the world with the right color/colors.

Game Jam Crew:

  • Uğur Önal - Game Designer and Programmer
  • Utkan Güder - Lead Programmer
  • Doğukan Kıvrak - UI Programmer
  • Fuat Can Eryiğit - Musics Designer
  • Mevsim Yalçıntaş - Sound Designer
